metadata.name: 𝐃𝐚𝐲 𝟏𝟎: 𝐋𝐢𝐛𝐞𝐫𝐭𝐲'𝐬 𝐋𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐒𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐝
metadata.description:
The world balances on a razor’s edge as humanity faces the final ten days of its existence. The once-bustling metropolis of Liberty State Park has been reduced to a desolate, radioactive wasteland. The dysfunction of a clock implies the insignificance of time. amidst the crumbling ruins, the fallen head of the Statue of Liberty serves as a last reminder of a civilization that once stood tall, now bound by chains and haunted by the desperate souls clinging to life.

In this apocalyptic twilight, survivors wander the forsaken land, grappling with the weight of their lost childhood and the bitter knowledge that freedom has fallen. the sad truth is that in this chaotic world, there are no saviors or safety nets to rely on, UNICEF is a joke. as the countdown to humanity’s end ticks away, those who remain must confront the shadows of their past and the chilling reality of their uncertain future.

In this haunting, poignant saga, the fate of the human race hangs in the balance, and the choices made in these final moments will determine whether the end is truly near or if salvation lies just beyond the horizon.

attributes.value: 10 days left until the world's end
